'''Beta 1.14.1.2''' is the fourth beta version for [[Bedrock Edition 1.14.1]], released on December 4, 2019,<ref>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/360037533411|title=Minecraft Beta - 1.14.1.2 (Xbox One/Windows 10/Android)|date=December 4, 2019}}</ref> which fixes bugs.

== Fixes ==
* Fixed several crashes that occurred during gameplay.
* Increased performance when loading [[skin]]s on featured servers.
* [[Bee]]s now die after attacking. ({{bug|MCPE-53860}})
* Fixed empty hands being invisible in first-person perspective.
* Fixed placeholder text appearing on the resource packs and behavior packs screens.</onlyinclude>

== Trivia ==
* This development version, the fourth for 1.14.1, was released before 1.14.0 had even been fully released.
